comment: Prof Fallu is so sweet and awesome. I've taken her for French 2001 and 2002 online and would take her again. There is a lot of work each week, but the assignments are not hard to do. She gives extra credit and good feedback on assignments. Plus, she is super accessible, and will answer any questions you have quickly! Great teacher, she really cares
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: I took her class twice, and both of them was online. Her class is easy, and she is very helpful to you. You cannot find a better French instructor than her.  Ell est aussi tr√®s belle.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I love professor Fallu! This is my third semester taking her online. Her online class is super easy to use. The modules don't have much work compared to in person classes and her tests, papers, and regular assignments are easy. She gives clear feedback and is always available to help if you need it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: I took her online class, the class was very easy, and she is very helpful.  I highly would recommend her class to another student.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Kindest prof I've had. If you need to jump a level to be in her class, email her and she'll help you. Online classes do require time though. Probably spent 4 hours a week. Assignments per week r 2 hours of textbook homework, 1 discussion thread, a few voicethreads, and watching videos. there r 4 papers & tests. Final: 1 skype call and test.

I had Ms. Fallu for French 1002 online and I loved it! She makes the work very easy and provides help if you need it. She uploads videos of her explaining all the grammar/vocab at the beginning of each unit and the entire online class is very organized. I definitely recommend if you're considering taking French online!
Mademoiselle Caro taught me so much! Can I have a toast? Really, one of the best.
native french speaker, what more can you say!

She is awesome! So sweet and very understanding. I took French all through highschool and was pretty nervous taking it in college because I forgot so much! She understood my situation and made the class so much fun! If you love playing study games, doing projects, etc. then this is your lady!

She's one of the best French teachers I've ever had. She understands that students in her class are on completely different levels, and she works with you on what you need to focus on. My friends and I were better at French, so she let us talk about whatever we wanted instead of doing the discussion questions, so long as we spoke in French.

She was a really great professor. She made class interesting and fun. She was very helpful and friendly. She's Canadian, so there can be some confusion at times for those very used to European Frech, but she's always willing to clarify. Loved her class!
For her first semester teaching, she did an absolutely amazing job!

She is an excellent teacher. Very clear and she helps you as much as she possibly can. I am honestly considering taking another French class just to have her again. She is so nice and friendly and I loved her class.
Her class and lessons are very clear. She's very easy to understand and is more than welcome to help out. Homework is pretty easy and assignments are pretty easy to understand.

She is one of the BEST French professors I've had while at KSU. I really hope I can take her again! She makes class interesting and fun with little video clips and music videos. Also, her group work isn't horrible like it is in some classes.
